${ModID}:AshesToAshes.NAME: Ashes to Ashes
${ModID}:AshesToAshes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:BlastFromThePast.NAME: Blast from the Past
${ModID}:BlastFromThePast.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, add an ${ModID}:Echo of this into your hand.

${ModID}:Blitz.NAME: Blitz
${ModID}:Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to a random enemy twice.

${ModID}:Bloodlust.NAME: Bloodlust
${ModID}:Bloodlust.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! ${ModID}:Fervor.

${ModID}:BunkerForm.NAME: Bunker Form
${ModID}:BunkerForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain Vigor equal to your leftover Block.
${ModID}:BunkerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain Vigor equal to your leftover Block.

${ModID}:BunnyHop.NAME: Bunny Hop
${ModID}:BunnyHop.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Jump. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, ${ModID}:Jump.

${ModID}:CastOff.NAME: Cast Off
${ModID}:CastOff.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust an Attack. NL Gain ${ModID}:Counter equal to twice its damage. NL ${ModID}:Clutch: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Counter

${ModID}:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
${ModID}:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block and {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

${ModID}:CirclesOfDeath.NAME: Circles of Death
${ModID}:CirclesOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Deathblow to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
${ModID}:Clairvoyance.DESCRIPTION: Make an ${ModID}:Echo of the top !M! cards in your draw pile. Add them into your hand.

${ModID}:ClutchClaw.NAME: Clutch Claw
${ModID}:ClutchClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Clutch: Increase the damage of ALL Clutch Claw cards by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Corporealize.NAME: Corporealize
${ModID}:Corporealize.DESCRIPTION: Choose an ${ModID}:Echo in your exhaust pile. NL Add a copy to your hand without ${ModID}:Echo. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Corporealize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an ${ModID}:Echo in your exhaust pile. NL Add a copy to your hand without ${ModID}:Echo.

${ModID}:CursedForge.NAME: Cursed Forge
${ModID}:CursedForge.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade an Attack in your hand !M! times for the rest of combat. NL Bypasses Upgrade limitations.

${ModID}:DireStrike.NAME: Dire Strike
${ModID}:DireStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have a debuff, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:DiveBomb.NAME: Dive Bomb
${ModID}:DiveBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have ${ModID}:Jumped this turn, ${ModID}:Jump and gain [E] .

${ModID}:EchoingHymn.NAME: Echoing Hymn
${ModID}:EchoingHymn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Make an ${ModID}:Echo of this in your discard pile.

${ModID}:Etherealize.NAME: Etherealize
${ModID}:Etherealize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Convert ALL your cards into ${ModID}:Echoes. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
${ModID}:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.NAME: Extreme Speed
${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Put X{@@}{!M!|>0= + !M!} random cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FatalSlash.NAME: Fatal Slash
${ModID}:FatalSlash.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${ModID}:Deathblow.

${ModID}:FireBlast.NAME: Fire Blast
${ModID}:FireBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage modifications affect this card twice.

${ModID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${ModID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Clutch: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

${ModID}:Flamethrower.NAME: Flamethrower
${ModID}:Flamethrower.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies whenever you play another card.

${ModID}:FlipKick.NAME: Flip Kick
${ModID}:FlipKick.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Jump. ${ModID}:Jump. NL Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FlipKick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Jump. ${ModID}:Jump. NL Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Flow.NAME: Flow
${ModID}:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, gain !B! Block whenever you play another card.

${ModID}:FocusSlash.NAME: Focus Slash
${ModID}:FocusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put an ${ModID}:Echo of this into your hand that costs 1 more and deals !M! additional damage.

${ModID}:Fortified.NAME: Fortified
${ModID}:Fortified.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [${ModID}:CarrotIcon] Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FromBeyond.NAME: From Beyond
${ModID}:FromBeyond.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, apply !M! ${ModID}:Deathblow to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Gambit.NAME: Gambit
${ModID}:Gambit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each time you lose HP this combat.

${ModID}:GreatSword.NAME: Great Sword
${ModID}:GreatSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Clutch: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Grow.NAME: Grow
${ModID}:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Place !M! ${ModID}:Carrots onto the top card in your draw pile.

${ModID}:Headhunter.NAME: Headhunter
${ModID}:Headhunter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:HelmBreaker.NAME: Helm Breaker
${ModID}:HelmBreaker.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Jump. NL Deal !D! damage for each time you have ${ModID}:Jumped this turn.{@@}{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !${ModID}:I! damage.)}

${ModID}:Kris.NAME: Kris
${ModID}:Kris.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals triple damage to enemies with Block.

${ModID}:Lethality.NAME: Lethality
${ModID}:Lethality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to the enemy's ${ModID}:Deathblow.

${ModID}:MagicSack.NAME: Magic Sack
${ModID}:MagicSack.DESCRIPTION: Put a copy of 1 of !M! random cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Plating.NAME: Plating
${ModID}:Plating.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Clutch: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Pluck.NAME: Pluck
${ModID}:Pluck.DESCRIPTION: Put [${ModID}:CarrotIcon] cards from your discard pile into your hand. Place a ${ModID}:Carrot on cards moved this way. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PowerupPunch.NAME: Powerup Punch
${ModID}:PowerupPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [${ModID}:CarrotIcon] Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose [${ModID}:CarrotIcon] Strength.

${ModID}:QuickManeuver.NAME: Quick Maneuver
${ModID}:QuickManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${ModID}:QuintessentialStrike.NAME: Quintessential Strike
${ModID}:QuintessentialStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cards containing "Strike" deal !M! additional damage this combat.

${ModID}:Rally.NAME: Rally
${ModID}:Rally.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!M!|2=${ModID}:Jump. ${ModID}:Jump.|3=${ModID}:Jump. ${ModID}:Jump. ${ModID}:Jump.|@=${ModID}:Jump !M! times.} NL Place a ${ModID}:Carrot onto cards drawn this way.

${ModID}:Roast.NAME: Roast
${ModID}:Roast.DESCRIPTION: Place a ${ModID}:Carrot onto a card in your hand. NL Gain [${ModID}:CarrotIcon] Energy.

${ModID}:SerratedEdge.NAME: Serrated Edge
${ModID}:SerratedEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
${ModID}:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust an Attack. NL Gain Vigor equal to twice its damage.

${ModID}:ShrapnelShield.NAME: Shrapnel Shield
${ModID}:ShrapnelShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Thorns.

${ModID}:SinisterStrike.NAME: Sinister Strike
${ModID}:SinisterStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Vigor equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Smokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
${ModID}:Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Snack.NAME: Snack
${ModID}:Snack.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you place ${ModID}:Carrots onto a card, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
${ModID}:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply ${ModID}:Deathblow equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:SoaringStrike.NAME: Soaring Strike
${ModID}:SoaringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have ${ModID}:Jumped this turn, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

${ModID}:SpiritSlash.NAME: Spirit Slash
${ModID}:SpiritSlash.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Deathblow. NL Next turn, add a ${ModID}:Echo of this into your hand.

${ModID}:SpringLoaded.NAME: Spring-Loaded
${ModID}:SpringLoaded.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Jump, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Stasis.NAME: Stasis
${ModID}:Stasis.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Next turn, add !M! ${ModID}:Echoes of it into your hand.

${ModID}:Subterfuge.NAME: Subterfuge
${ModID}:Subterfuge.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card enters your draw pile, gain !M! ${ModID}:Counter.

${ModID}:SweepingBlade.NAME: Sweeping Blade
${ModID}:SweepingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle an ${ModID}:Echo of this into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Timeless.NAME: Timeless
${ModID}:Timeless.DESCRIPTION: Effects that happen next turn instead happen immediately.

${ModID}:Velocity.NAME: Velocity
${ModID}:Velocity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Jump{@@}{!M!|>1= !M! times}.
${ModID}:Velocity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Jump{@@}{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:Vibrations.NAME: Vibrations
${ModID}:Vibrations.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an ${ModID}:Echo, gain !M! Block.
